issue.title: [Java]: Support JSE17 for Java Cookbooks
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16291](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16291). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Realize changes needed to run cookbooks through JSE17.
